array.name: lst_des
array.item: Tenbit pizza is a pizza joint that has been around for over 8 years serving affordable italian style pizza
Yenat guada is a small place that serves affordable Ethiopian food for cheap without compromising on quality, It has a good reputation amongst students for it price

Boss Burger is a franchise that has been growing rapidly, it servers american style hamburgers \nThe price is a bit high end and is not for everyone but the quality is as said by many \"TO DIE FOR\"
